column5:
1. Invitation link should be sent to the given email id
2. It should show the invited email address in table on invite members page

We should not be able to invite ourselves or invite someone who is already member
Invalid emails should not work on both client and server

2. Invited agent should successfully join the KiboPush
3. It should now in members page table and not in invite members page

column4:
On the invitation link, we should either show invalid link screen if link is expired or we should show join company form.

Email address field should be filled in this case.
column5:

User should not be able to use the used invitation link again. The link should expire after user has made an account

column3:
Invite Customers by 
Uploading CSV File
column4:
1. Login 
2. Click on Invite Using Phone Number
3. Change Page
4. Click on Upload CSV File
5. Choose a CSV file with columns 'names' and 'phone_numbers '
6. Click on Invitation Message
7. Change the Invitation Message
8. Click on Submit
column5:
File Uploaded Successfully.
Phone numbers will be sent 
invitation message on facebook.

column3:
Invite Customers by 
Uploading CSV File
column4:
1. Login 
2. Click on Invite Using Phone Number
3. Click on Upload CSV File
4. Choose a csv file with columns: 'name' and 'phone_numbers'
5. Click on Invitation Message
6. Change the Invitation Message
7. Click on Submit
column5:
1.Phone numbers will be sent 
invitation message on facebook.
2. New Customer List will be added

column3:
Invite Customers by 
Uploading CSV File
column4:
1. Login 
2. Click on Invite Using Phone Number
3. Click on Upload CSV File
4. Choose a file with a name similar to the file uploaded earlier
5. Verify alert
6. Click on Yes button for the alert 
7. Change the Invitation Message
8. Click on Submit
column5:
1.Phone numbers will be sent 
 invitation message on facebook.
2. Customer List with a similar name will be updated

column3:
Invite customers by
manually entering phone
numbers
column4:
1. Login 
2. Click on Invite Using Phone Number
3. Click on Enter Phone Number Manually
4. Enter Phone Numbers
5. Click on Invitation Message
6. Change the Invitation Message
7. Click on Submit
column5:
1.Phone numbers will be sent 
invitation message on facebook.
2. Customer List with name 'Other'
will be updated.

column3:
View user uploaded lists
through customer matching
column4:
1. Login 
2. Go to Segment Subscribers
column5:
1.The lists which were uploaded
by the user using 'invite using phone numbers screen' and has subscribers will be shown.
2. These lists can be viewed and deleted. But cannot be edited.

column4:
1. Login 
2. Click on Segment Subscribers
column5:
1.User is able to see any list
created earlier .
2.User is able to see lists that were
uploaded using 'Invite By Phone Numbers' 
and has subscribers in it.

column3: Create a list by segmenting through all subscribers
column4:
1. Login 
2. Click on Segment Subscribers
3. Click on Create Segmented Subscribers List
4. Enter List Name
5. Select Condition
6. Select Criteria
7. Enter Text 
8. Add or Remove conditions
9.Click Save
column5:
1.A new list will be created
from all subscribers based on the condition.
2. In case condition returns an empty list, an alert will be shown

column3: Create a list by segmenting using an existing list
column4:
1. Login 
2. Click on Segment Subscribers
3. Click on Segment an exisiting list
4. Select List
4. Enter List Name
5. Select Condition
6. Select Criteria
7. Enter Text 
8. Add or Remove conditions
9.Click Save
column5:
1.A new list will be created
from subscribers of the parent list, based on the condition.
2. In case condition returns an empty list, an alert will be shown

column4:
1. Login 
2. Click on Segment Subscibers
3. Click on View of a list
column5: Susbcriber Information will be seen for the list

column4:
. Login 
2. Click on Segment Subscibers
3. Click on Delete of a list
column5: List entry will be deleted

2. Click on Segment Subscriber
3. Click on View of a list
4. Enter xxx on Search
column5: Subscriber data will be filtered

column4:
1. Login 
2. Click on Segment Subscriber
3. Click on View of a list
4. Click on Export Records in CSV file
column5: Record downloaded in csv file

column4:
1. Login 
2. Click on Segment Subscribers
3. Click on Edit of a list
4. Change List Name
5. Change Condition
6. Change Criteria
7. Change Text 
8. Add or Remove conditions
9.Click Update
column5:
1.List will be updated
from subscribers of the parent list, based on the condition.
2. In case condition returns an empty list, an alert will be shown
